snippet.title: Borderlands 3   'So Happy Together' Official Trailer   Stadia Connect
snippet.description:
Let's make some mayhem! Borderlands 3 is officially coming to Stadia and we're so happy together!

Watch the full Stadia Connect: g.co/stadiaconnect
